name: Chapter 1 - The Creation
description:
This is a poetic game about creation, about how things come to life. Sometimes randomly. What will our little hero learn throughout this first journey?

Episode length : around 10 minutes

Development process

Inspired by the webcomic scene, Sprite Sequence was first developed and released under a weekly schedule, with a new game "sequence" released every Friday.

This here Volume 1 wraps-up the 10 first sequences, all remastered into a more cohesive experience.

New and Improved!
  • Completely redesigned first levels
  • Lots of new character animations
  • Now with sound and music (a little)!
  • And other surprises...

The game is free but any donation is GREATLY appreciated and will help me work on new games. If you want to support my current work, the easiest way to do so is to just purchase my game here and send me the amount you decide as a donation.

This help put food on the table for me and my family.

Follow the project!
